Interface FacebookService

public interface FacebookService

All facebook related functionality is accessible through this service.

getAccessToken

java.lang.String getAccessToken(java.lang.String code)
Return facebook access token. From facebook docs: If your app is successfully authenticated and the authorization code from the user is valid, the authorization server will return the access token. In addition to the access token (the access_token parameter), the response contains the number of seconds until the token expires (the expires parameter). Once the token expires, you will need to re-run the steps above to generate a new code and access_token, although if the user has already authorized your app, they will not be prompted to do so again. If there is an issue authenticating your app, the authorization server will issue an HTTP 400 and return the error in the body of the response.

Parameters:
code - - code returned by facebook after authorization
Returns:
access token string or null
